input.sentences: meeting together to go for a bicycle excursion
a scenic view of the ocean as we ride along the shore
we rode to the end and we are going to the tents

output.sentences: The bicyclist gathered at the parking lot to begin their excursion.
As the bicyclists rode down the highway, they remained in a single line to voide accidents.
The view of the beach from the hillside was beautiful.
The bicyclist made their way to the finish line where the tents and food trucks were at.
There were several prizes and give aways during the finish line fair.
